actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE sys_user SET
		USERNAME = '{{update_form.fieldState.USERNAME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.USERNAME : update_form.sourceData.USERNAME}}',
		PASSWORD = '{{update_form.fieldState.PASSWORD.isVisible ? update_form.formData.PASSWORD : update_form.sourceData.PASSWORD}}',
    NICKNAME = '{{update_form.fieldState.NICKNAME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.NICKNAME : update_form.sourceData.NICKNAME}}',
		AVATAR = '{{update_form.fieldState.AVATAR.isVisible ? update_form.formData.AVATAR : update_form.sourceData.AVATAR}}',
		GENDER = '{{update_form.fieldState.GENDER.isVisible ? update_form.formData.GENDER : update_form.sourceData.GENDER}}',
		EMAIL = '{{update_form.fieldState.EMAIL.isVisible ? update_form.formData.EMAIL : update_form.sourceData.EMAIL}}',
		PHONE = '{{update_form.fieldState.PHONE.isVisible ? update_form.formData.PHONE : update_form.sourceData.PHONE}}',
		STATUS = '{{update_form.fieldState.STATUS.isVisible ? update_form.formData.STATUS : update_form.sourceData.STATUS}}',
		DEPT_ID = '{{update_form.fieldState.DEPT_ID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DEPT_ID : update_form.sourceData.DEPT_ID}}',
		TENANT_ID = '{{update_form.fieldState.TENANT_ID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.TENANT_ID : update_form.sourceData.TENANT_ID}}',
		REVISION = '{{update_form.fieldState.REVISION.isVisible ? update_form.formData.REVISION : update_form.sourceData.REVISION}}'
  WHERE ID = {{data_table.selectedRow.ID}};
